title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater super soft, comfy, and easy on the skin, with several color options and good quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars MUST Have This In Your Wardrobe
items.body: Staple wardrobe piece for a capsule wardrobe with all the simple but lovely finds you mix and match, mixed and double belted, mastering the art of mixing textures and styles to suit your mood. This one is perfect, oversized (I got a medium, but small would have been fine). I LOVE the loose slouchy drop shoulder Vanilla Ice Cream color. It's so so cuddly and soft. This can be worn front the back or back to the front if you prefer, either off-shoulder or pulled up with the sleeves pushed up or down. It's a must have and the color is PERFECT. This is expensive looking and made so well. You will want to pull this over a long silky skirt or slip dress, cowboy boots and an unexpectedly seductive fragrance! Buy this in more than one color, thank me later! You'll love wearing this and feel so cozy and lovely. Read more
items.author: le fleur

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I liked it so much. I gave it to my son and ordered another for myself!
items.body: As soon as I put this sweater on, it was pure love and I wore it several days before I had my son try it on. He’s several inches taller and weighs 20 pounds more than I do but he’s 18 so he looks like a stick just like me. His face looked like he’d won the Lottery When I told him he could keep it! Two minutes later, I had one on the way myself! I can’t wear wool anymore It pains me to say; I was an avid knitter and loved fancy wool yarn, especially from Japan. But now that I can’t be a wool snob it opens up a lot of other sweater Possibilities and this sweater is the best of all possibilities. We both have a black one. I may get one in a different color, but he won’t. It is so soft! And it’s not itchy at all. It washes & dries well- follow the directions! I believe we both got mediums because I didn’t want it to be clingy so it’s very large on both of us. My son loves it over tight pants because he says it looks like Trent Reznor’s wardrobe. I love it over tight pants because I think it looks really cool and I’m 57 so it looks cooler than Trent Reznor‘s wardrobe to me! The sweater feels lightweight, but it’s warm. We live in a funny part of upstate New York where the weather changes rapidly, and it can be cold out, but then the sun will come out and you’ll be dying of the heat. This is a really nice midweight sweater that you can layer, you won’t regret it. You can wear it by itself or with just a tank top underneath it too! And it looks good with wide artsy pants as well and skirts. I want to cover every possible Avenue because I really love this sweater and I think you will too. As long as the size is what you want, you have nothing else to worry about. I can’t say whether it’s big or small for the size because we purposely ordered larger Sizes then we needed. I hope you enjoy your new sweater! Read more
items.author: Kari E. Gronros

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super Oversized & Comfy
items.body: This sweater is extremely oversized. I was considering returning but I kept it because it’s so comfortable. The back hangs very low, to my upper thighs (I am 5’5, 135 lbs). I found it very odd that both tags, wash instructions and size tag were sown on the exterior. I managed to remove the washing instructions tag without damaging the sweater but I don’t think I can do the same with the size tag. Overall, comfy lounge sweater. Read more
items.author: Jessica Hoffman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oversized but not Overpriced
items.body: This oversized sweater is the perfect addition to a short skirt, leggings, or a pair of bell-bottom jeans. I ordered my usual size for a baggy look, but you could easily size down for a more form-fitted look. The material is extremely soft and of high quality. The sleeves were a little long for my 5'2'' frame, but one roll at the wrist gave it a cute look. It is an excellent value for the money and has several color options for variety. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Meh
items.body: Super soft. Very oversized. I’m between small and medium and would go with XS if available. Returned because the fabric is cheap and this will pill after 1 wear. Read more
items.author: Paul McCord

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great oversized sweater!
items.body: I love this sweater! It’s very cozy and soft, I got an XL and it’s a perfect oversized fit! It did not shrink when I washed it right out of the package. It is warm enough without being too thick of fabric! Read more
items.author: Abigail

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater
items.body: Love this sweater. It fits well, sized right, and looks great on. It's the perfect weight too to keep you warm but not overly hot. Read more
items.author: Michele Freelon

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't waste your money
items.body: the color is about the only thing accurate of the picture. It's not long nor does it hang like the picture. It's basically a regular sweater top Read more
items.author: Shopaholic

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Azure, Gray, Blue, Rose, Black, Camel, Dark Gray, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Wine Red, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
